item.title: Physics Mod v1.3 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 15, 2025

Physics Mod v1.3 ATS

Suspension & Cabin Movement
Chassis Suspension Overhaul – More realistic weight transfer and rebound behavior.
Cabin Suspension Adjustments – Improved independent cabin movement that reacts naturally to road conditions.
Balanced Cabin Lean & Roll – No more “blocky” side-to-side motion; smoother transitions.
Reduced Over-Dampening – Trucks now feel less stiff and more responsive to bumps and terrain.

Transmission, Gearbox Behavior & Powertrain Realism
Improved Automatic Shifting Logic
Shifts at lower RPMs under light throttle for better fuel efficiency.
Holds gears properly under load for realistic power delivery.
Reduced excessive gear hunting.
Adjusted shift timing for a more natural feel.
Refined Manual Gearbox Behavior
Clutch engagement tuned for smoother starts.
More realistic RPM fall.
Improved Transmission Resistance – More natural power loss through the drivetrain, making acceleration and deceleration feel smoother and more authentic.
Balanced Flywheel Inertia – The engine now holds and loses revs in a more progressive and realistic way, improving shift behavior and coasting.
Refined Torque Converter Behavior – Gear shifts feel smoother and more natural, especially under load, preventing excessive slipping while maintaining realistic power delivery.

Steering & Handling
More Progressive Steering Response – Less sensitive at center for better highway stability.
Balanced Steering Wheel Travel – Adjusted max steering angle to better match real trucks (38 degrees)
Supports Gamepads – Features realistic, speed-sensitive auto-centering for smooth and precise control.

Road & Environment Interaction
Refined Wheel Slip Behavior – Adjusted slip factors to reduce understeer/oversteer.
More Noticeable Mini-Bumps & Road Feedback – Feels more like a real truck suspension.
Subtle Air Seat Movement Simulation – Adds immersion with natural seat bounce over bumps.

Realistic Throttle Curve
Optional realistic throttle curve included, providing smoother and more progressive throttle response. This improves low-speed control, reduces jerky acceleration, and enhances realism by mimicking the way real truck engines respond to throttle input.

Compatibility & Optimization
Works with All Trucks – Fully compatible with stock and modded trucks (providing they have independent chassis/cabin physics)

Designed for Wheel Users – Balanced for users with a steering wheel.
Designed for Gamepad Users – Handle your truck with ease without a steering wheel.

Credits: zeemods

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MAZ 5440E9 Prostor v5.0 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 15, 2025

MAZ 5440E9 Prostor v5.0 1.55 ETS2

General information:
– 1 PROSTOR-series Cabin
– 1 4×2 5440E9 chassis
– 1 engine Daimler OM 501 Euro-5
– Own PROSTOR-series interior and animation
– 1 ZF16s transmission options
– Lightmask
– Full 8K & 4K AO Baked 3D model
– Support DLC CA, Wolly & SISL’s Accessories Packs
– Own Animated Trailer Cables
– Animation of wipers, roof hatch and windows
– Alot of accessories
– Trailers
– Templates
– Mod adapted for 1.55

Credits: Nikola

item.title: Scania V8 Open pipe sound SJ Concept v1.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 15, 2025

Scania V8 Open pipe sound SJ Concept v1.1 ETS2

– New sound for NG Scania engines
– New EGR VGT ENGINE (520, 580, 730) engine sounds for NG and 6 Series
– Added automatic exhaust brake engage sound when shifting for NG Scania
– Adjusted rpm drop speed

– Scania DC16 V8 Euro 3-5 500-620HP with open pipe sound
– Exhaust brake auto-engage when shifting on opticruise gearbox
– Gearbox whine sound
– Retarder sound
– Opticruise shifting sound if you choose opticruise gearbox
– Max Volume regulation for reduced chance of audio clipping and sound cutting
– Sound attenuation effects for realistic sound fade off from the distance
– Sound distortions and directional effects for realistic distortions from different positions around the truck
– Exhaust valve system to switch between straight pipe and stock exhaust

Credits: Slav Jerry

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Pack Tuning Renault Range T v1.4 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 15, 2025

Pack Tuning Renault Range T v1.4 ETS2

– 71 new colors
– 4 new rear bumpers
– 1 new wing cabin (completely black plastic)
– 2 new sun visors
– 1 new wing landing gear (fully painted)
– 2 new stripes (paint and chrome) -> Template included
– 2 new front elements wind frames (painted and chrome)
– 3 slotted lobes (plastic, paint and chrome)
– 7 low chassis
– License plate number individually
– 3 tall tubes (chrome, painted and black)
– Orange DRL
– 6 front grilles (2 color options and chrome)
– 5 steering wheels (red/yellow/blue/grey Danish color)
– 5 new colors (BERLIET brand)
– 1 front bumper trim with LED strip
– 5 new cabin reflectors: (red, yellow, green, blue and black)
– 2 new roof spoilers (chrome and plastic)
– 2 new interior spoilers (chrome and plastic)
– 2 new standalone steering wheels

– Added slots on the sun shade for paint
– Added 11 SAVIEM colors (86 colors)
– Standalone paint filter -> Template included
– 1 new cabin reflector (paint)

Test on v1.55

Credits: HorseeHorse Modding

item.title: Oberhavel v1.7.3 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 15, 2025

Oberhavel v1.7.3 ETS2

Oberhavel is a district in the north of Berlin.

The map mod includes two towns:
Velten with four businesses, two gas stations, a garage, and a workshop with its own house.
Germendorf in the industrial area with two businesses and a workshop.

Small graphic fixes.

Credits: I_KIMBLE_I
